### getImplicitFormat() {#afe5829a3fc496a2c60417e8f568d40a8}

<MemberDefinition

<SectionUser title="Returns">
either the implicit format of this AST, a diagnostic against <code>SM</code> if implicit formats of the AST&#39;s components conflict, or NoFormat if the AST has no implicit format (e.g. AST is made up of a single literal).
</SectionUser>
